ios.subtitle: FIFA Mobile is now FC Mobile!

editorialNotes.standard: Miniclip’s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

editorialNotes.tagline: Run, climb and swim to win

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Play a star in soccer games!

editorialNotes.standard: Always wanted to be a football star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldn’t be simpler—simply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Tap and bounce to a high score

editorialNotes.short: Tap to jump into as many crazy hoop challenges as possible.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: CSR2 PvP Car Drag Racing Games

editorialNotes.tagline: Put the pedal to the metal
editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever—and you won’t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

ios.subtitle: Your Ultimate Team on the go

editorialNotes.standard: Gorgeous real-world scenery, action-packed mini-games and snappy controls keep us hooked on this beautiful fishing game.

ios.subtitle: Feel the Rush & Catch Big Ones

editorialNotes.standard: This stylish racer is full of visual wonders, plus licenced cars and an option-rich character creator.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Grab rewards in the sporty new season.

editorialNotes.standard: Enter the world of Rocky Balboa with this tactically rich boxing simulation. Whether you play as Adonis “Creed” Johnson or design your own pugilist, dazzling graphics and fluid controls immerse you in the action. Swipe and tap to throw uppercuts and dodge body blows, maneuvering a global roster of opponents into position for the knockout. Training minigames upgrade your skills between bouts, but you’ll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to become the best.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: World Cricket Battle 2 (WCB2)
artistName: Creative Monkey Games & Technologies Private Limited

editorialNotes.tagline: Could you be the new champ?
